SELECT /* WaqDmnMapper.selectDmnRqstListbyMst */ A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO, A.DMN_ID, A.DMN_LNM, IFNULL(A.DMN_PNM,'-') AS DMN_PNM, IFNULL(A.LNM_CRI_DS,'-') AS LNM_CRI_DS, IFNULL(A.PNM_CRI_DS,'-') AS PNM_CRI_DS, A.RQST_DCD, A.RVW_CONTS , A.VRF_CD, A.VRF_RMK, A.DMNG_ID, A.DMNG_LNM, A.INFOTP_ID , A.DATA_TYPE , A.DATA_LEN , A.DATA_SCAL , A.INFOTP_LNM , A.UPP_DMN_ID, A.UPP_DMN_LNM, A.MDL_LNM, A.UPP_SUBJ_LNM, A.SUBJ_ID, A.SUBJ_LNM, A.LST_ENTY_ID, A.LST_ENTY_PNM , A.LST_ENTY_LNM, A.LST_ATTR_ID, A.LST_ATTR_PNM, A.LST_ATTR_LNM, A.CD_VAL_TYP_CD, A.CD_VAL_IVW_CD, A.DATA_FRM, A.SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN, A.CRG_USER_ID , GET_USER_NM(A.CRG_USER_ID) AS CRG_USER_NM , A.DMN_ORG_DS, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID , A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID, A.FULL_PATH,A.ENC_YN,A.DMN_DSCD ,A.DMN_ORG_TXT, A.SUB_CD_YN
, CASE WHEN A.RVW_STS_CD = '2' THEN '2' ELSE '0' END AS RVW_STS_CD
, A.RVW_STS_CD
, CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' ELSE CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '5' THEN '#0000FF' END END AS FontColor , GET_USER_NM(A.RQST_USER_ID) AS RQST_USER_NM , V.UPP_DMNG_ID , V.UPP_DMNG_LNM , A.DMN_MIN_VAL , A.DMN_MAX_VAL , A.STND_ASRT , S.SYS_AREA_ID FROM WAQ_DMN A LEFT JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE B ON B.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31','%Y-%m-%d') AND B.INFOTP_LNM = A.INFOTP_LNM
AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT LEFT JOIN V_WAA_DMNG V ON A.DMNG_ID = V.DMNG_ID AND V.DMNG_LVL > 0
LEFT JOIN WAA_SUBJ S ON A.SUBJ_ID = S.SUBJ_ID AND A.STND_ASRT = S.STND_ASRT AND S.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231','%Y%m%d') AND S.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U')
WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND A.VRF_CD = '1'
ORDER BY A.RQST_SNO

+

SELECT /* WaqDmnMapper.selectExistsDmnCheck */ DMN_ID FROM WAQ_DMN WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 0,1
mapper.insert:
INSERT /* WaqDmnMapper.insertwam2waq */ INTO WAQ_DMN (RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, DMN_ID, DMN_LNM, DMN_PNM, LNM_CRI_DS, RQST_DCD, DMNG_ID, DMNG_LNM , INFOTP_ID, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL, INFOTP_LNM, UPP_DMN_ID, UPP_DMN_LNM , SUBJ_ID, LST_ENTY_ID, LST_ENTY_PNM, LST_ENTY_LNM, CD_VAL_TYP_CD, CD_VAL_IVW_CD , DATA_FRM, SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN, CRG_USER_ID, DMN_ORG_DS, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS,ENC_YN,DMN_DSCD,DMN_ORG_TXT,SUB_CD_YN, STND_ASRT ) SELECT #{reqmst.rqstNo} , IFNULL((SELECT MAX(X.RQST_SNO) FROM WAQ_DMN X WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{reqmst.rqstNo} ), 0) + @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS RQST_SNO , A.DMN_ID, A.DMN_LNM, A.DMN_PNM, A.LNM_CRI_DS, 'CU', A.DMNG_ID, B.DMNG_LNM , A.INFOTP_ID, C.DATA_TYPE, C.DATA_LEN, C.DATA_SCAL, C.INFOTP_LNM, A.UPP_DMN_ID, D.DMN_LNM , A.SUBJ_ID, A.LST_ENTY_ID, A.LST_ENTY_PNM, A.LST_ENTY_LNM, A.CD_VAL_TYP_CD, A.CD_VAL_IVW_CD , A.DATA_FRM, A.SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN, A.CRG_USER_ID, A.DMN_ORG_DS, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS,A.ENC_YN,A.DMN_DSCD,A.DMN_ORG_TXT,A.SUB_CD_YN , A.STND_ASRT FROM (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP, WAM_DMN A LEFT JOIN WAA_DMNG B ON A.DMNG_ID = B.DMNG_ID AND A.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT AND B.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE C ON A.INFOTP_ID = C.INFOTP_ID AND A.STND_ASRT = C.STND_ASRT AND C.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_DMN D ON A.UPP_DMN_ID = D.DMN_ID AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT
WHERE (A.DMN_ID,A.STND_ASRT) IN
( #{item.dmnId} , #{item.stndAsrt} )
AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')

SELECT /* WaqDmnMapper.selectwamlist */ IFNULL((SELECT MAX(X.RQST_SNO) FROM WAQ_DMN X WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{reqmst.rqstNo} ), 0) + @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS RQST_SNO , 'I' AS IBS_STATUS , A.DMN_ID, A.DMN_LNM, A.DMN_PNM, A.LNM_CRI_DS, A.PNM_CRI_DS , #{reqmst.rqstDcd} AS RQST_DCD, A.DMNG_ID, B.DMNG_LNM , A.INFOTP_ID, C.DATA_TYPE, C.DATA_LEN, C.DATA_SCAL, C.INFOTP_LNM, A.UPP_DMN_ID, D.DMN_LNM AS UPP_DMN_LNM , A.SUBJ_ID, A.LST_ENTY_ID, A.LST_ENTY_PNM, A.LST_ENTY_LNM, A.LST_ATTR_ID, A.LST_ATTR_PNM, A.LST_ATTR_LNM, A.CD_VAL_TYP_CD, A.CD_VAL_IVW_CD , A.DATA_FRM, A.SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN, A.CRG_USER_ID, A.DMN_ORG_DS, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS,A.ENC_YN,A.DMN_DSCD,A.FULL_PATH,A.DMN_ORG_TXT,A.SUB_CD_YN , A.STND_ASRT FROM (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP, WAM_DMN A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_DMNG B ON A.DMNG_ID = B.DMNG_ID AND A.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT AND B.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d')
LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE C ON A.INFOTP_ID = C.INFOTP_ID AND A.STND_ASRT = C.STND_ASRT AND C.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_DMN D ON A.UPP_DMN_ID = D.DMN_ID AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT
WHERE (A.DMN_ID , A.STND_ASRT) IN
( #{item.dmnId} , #{item.stndAsrt} )
AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')

UPDATE /* WaqDmnMapper.updateByPrimaryKeySelective */ WAQ_DMN
DMN_ID = #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMN_LNM = #{dmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMN_PNM = #{dmnPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

UPP_DMN_ID = #{uppDmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

LST_ATTR_PNM = #{lstAttrPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LST_ATTR_LNM = #{lstAttrLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CRG_USER_ID = #{crgUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRG_USER_NM = #{crgUserNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update /* WaqDmnMapper.updateByPrimaryKey */ WAQ_DMN set DMN_ID = #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMN_LNM = #{dmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMN_PNM = #{dmnPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LNM_CRI_DS = #{lnmCriDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PNM_CRI_DS = #{pnmCriDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMNG_ID = #{dmngId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMNG_LNM = #{dmngLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFOTP_ID = #{infotpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_TYPE = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_LEN = #{dataLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DATA_SCAL = #{dataScal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INFOTP_LNM = #{infotpLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPP_DMN_ID = #{uppDmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPP_DMN_LNM = #{uppDmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MDL_LNM = #{mdlLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPP_SUBJ_LNM = #{uppSubjLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBJ_ID = #{subjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBJ_LNM = #{subjLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LST_ENTY_ID = #{lstEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LST_ENTY_PNM = #{lstEntyPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LST_ENTY_LNM = #{lstEntyLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CD_VAL_TYP_CD = #{cdValTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CD_VAL_IVW_CD = #{cdValIvwCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_FRM = #{dataFrm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN = #{sditmAutoCrtYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRG_USER_ID = #{crgUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRG_USER_NM = #{crgUserNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMN_ORG_DS = #{dmnOrgDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENC_YN = #{encYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMN_DSCD = #{dmnDscd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMN_ORG_TXT = #{dmnOrgTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUB_CD_YN = #{subCdYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STND_ASRT = #{stndAsrt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

UPDATE /* WaqDmnMapper.updateCheckInit */ WAQ_DMN A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_DMN B ON B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND B.DMN_LNM = A.DMN_LNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT SET A.REG_TYP_CD = CASE WHEN A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' THEN 'D' ELSE CASE WHEN B.DMN_ID IS NULL THEN 'C' ELSE 'U' END END, A.DMN_ID = B.DMN_ID, A.VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
/* WaqDmnMapper.checkRequestDmn */
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_MSTR E INNER JOIN WAQ_DMN D ON E.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO WHERE E.RQST_NO != #{rqstNo} AND E.RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' AND A.DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND IFNULL(D.RVW_STS_CD, 0) != '2' )

/* WaqDmnMapper.checkDupDmn */
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DMN D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND A.RQST_SNO != D.RQST_SNO)

/* WaqDmnMapper.checkNotExistDmn */
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DMN D WHERE A.DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U'))

/* WaqDmnMapper.checkLnmSymn */
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_SYMN D WHERE A.DMN_LNM = IFNULL(D.SYMN_LNM,'_') AND A.DMN_PNM = IFNULL(D.SYMN_PNM,'_') AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') )

/* WaqDmnMapper.checkEngUseItem */
AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DMN D WHERE A.DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM AND A.DMN_PNM != D.DMN_PNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') ) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DMN D INNER JOIN WAM_SDITM E ON D.DMN_ID = E.DMN_ID AND D.STND_ASRT = E.STND_ASRT AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') WHERE D.DMN_LNM = A.DMN_LNM AND D.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_SDITM F WHERE F.SDITM_LNM = E.SDITM_LNM AND F.STND_ASRT = E.STND_ASRT AND F.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) )

/* WaqDmnMapper.checkUseDmn */
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DMN D INNER JOIN WAM_SDITM E ON D.DMN_ID = E.DMN_ID AND D.STND_ASRT = E.STND_ASRT AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') WHERE A.DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_SDITM F WHERE E.SDITM_LNM = F.SDITM_LNM AND E.STND_ASRT = F.STND_ASRT AND F.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_SDITM D WHERE A.DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND D.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

/* WaqDmnMapper.ckeckNotDmnLnmCd */
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAA_DMNG D WHERE A.DMNG_LNM = D.DMNG_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231','%Y%m%d') AND D.FULL_PATH LIKE '코드%') AND A.DMN_LNM NOT LIKE '%코드'

/* WaqDmnMapper.checkExistLstEnty */
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.LST_ENTY_PNM IS NOT NULL AND A.LST_ENTY_LNM IS NOT NULL AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_TBL D WHERE A.LST_ENTY_PNM = D.PDM_TBL_PNM AND A.LST_ENTY_PNM = D.PDM_TBL_PNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') )

/* WaqDmnMapper.checkExistLstAttr */
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.LST_ENTY_PNM IS NOT NULL AND A.LST_ENTY_LNM IS NOT NULL AND A.LST_ATTR_PNM IS NOT NULL AND A.LST_ATTR_LNM IS NOT NULL AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_COL E INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL D ON E.PDM_TBL_ID = D.PDM_TBL_ID AND E.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.LST_ENTY_PNM = D.PDM_TBL_PNM AND A.LST_ENTY_LNM = D.PDM_TBL_LNM AND A.LST_ATTR_PNM = E.PDM_COL_PNM AND A.LST_ATTR_LNM = E.PDM_COL_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND A.STND_ASRT = E.STND_ASRT AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') )

/* WaqDmnMapper.checkHasCdValNotCdDmn */
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU'
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_CD_VAL D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = D.RQST_SNO AND D.RQST_DCD = 'CU' UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DMN D INNER JOIN WAM_CD_VAL E ON E.DMN_ID = D.DMN_ID
AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_CD_VAL F WHERE F.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND D.DMN_LNM = F.DMN_LNM AND D.STND_ASRT = F.STND_ASRT AND E.CD_VAL = F.CD_VAL ) )

/* WaqDmnMapper.checkCdValDmnInfoLeng */
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_CD_VAL D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = D.RQST_SNO AND D.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.DATA_LEN < LENGTH(D.CD_VAL) UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DMN D INNER JOIN WAM_CD_VAL E ON E.DMN_ID = D.DMN_ID AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.DATA_LEN < LENGTH(E.CD_VAL) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_CD_VAL F WHERE F.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND D.DMN_LNM = F.DMN_LNM AND D.STND_ASRT = F.STND_ASRT AND E.CD_VAL = F.CD_VAL ) )

/* WaqDmnMapper.checkSubj */
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAA_SUBJ D WHERE A.FULL_PATH = D.FULL_PATH AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')) AND A.FULL_PATH IS NOT NULL

/* WaqDmnMapper.checkExistStwd */
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_STWD_CNFG D WHERE D.BIZ_DTL_CD = #{bizDtlCd} AND A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = D.RQST_SNO AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_STWD E WHERE D.STWD_LNM = E.STWD_LNM AND D.STWD_PNM = E.STWD_PNM AND D.STND_ASRT = E.STND_ASRT AND E.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND E.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND E.VRF_CD = '1' UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAM_STWD E WHERE D.STWD_LNM = E.STWD_LNM AND D.STWD_PNM = E.STWD_PNM AND D.STND_ASRT = E.STND_ASRT AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_STWD F WHERE E.STWD_LNM = F.STWD_LNM AND E.STWD_PNM = F.STWD_PNM AND E.STND_ASRT = F.STND_ASRT AND F.VRF_CD = '1' AND F.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) ) )

/* WaqDmnMapper.checkInfoType */
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAA_DMNG D INNER JOIN WAA_DMNG_INFOTP_MAP E ON D.DMNG_ID = E.DMNG_ID AND E.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231','%Y%m%d') INNER JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE F ON E.INFOTP_ID = F.INFOTP_ID AND F.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231','%Y%m%d') WHERE A.DMNG_LNM = D.DMNG_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231','%Y%m%d') AND A.INFOTP_LNM = F.INFOTP_LNM )

/* WaqDmnMapper.checkNotExistPrntDmn */
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND IFNULL(A.UPP_DMN_LNM,'') != '' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DMN D WHERE A.UPP_DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND D.RQST_DCD = 'CU' UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DMN D WHERE A.UPP_DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DMN F WHERE D.DMN_LNM = F.DMN_LNM AND D.STND_ASRT = F.STND_ASRT AND F.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) )

/* WaqDmnMapper.checkChldDmnExist */
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DMN D WHERE A.DMN_LNM = D.UPP_DMN_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND D.RQST_DCD = 'CU' UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DMN D INNER JOIN WAM_DMN E ON D.DMN_ID = E.UPP_DMN_ID AND D.STND_ASRT = E.STND_ASRT AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DMN F WHERE E.DMN_LNM = F.DMN_LNM AND E.STND_ASRT = F.STND_ASRT AND F.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) )

/* WaqDmnMapper.checkDupDmnPnm */
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAA_DMNG D WHERE A.DMNG_LNM = D.DMNG_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND D.CD_DMN_YN = 'Y') AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DMN D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.DMN_LNM != D.DMN_LNM AND A.DMN_PNM = D.DMN_PNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.RQST_DCD = 'CU' UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DMN D WHERE A.DMN_LNM != D.DMN_LNM AND A.DMN_PNM = D.DMN_PNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DMN F WHERE D.DMN_LNM = F.DMN_LNM AND D.STND_ASRT = F.STND_ASRT AND F.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) )

/* WaqDmnMapper.checkExistsDscd */
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.CD_VAL_TYP_CD IN ('O','C') AND A.DMN_DSCD IS NULL

/* WaqDmnMapper.checkExistsDscdAlready */
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'C' AND A.CD_VAL_TYP_CD IN ('O','C') AND EXISTS (SELECT DMN_DSCD FROM WAM_DMN D WHERE D.DMN_DSCD IN A.DMN_DSCD AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND D.DMN_PNM !=A.DMN_PNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT UNION ALL SELECT DMN_DSCD FROM WAQ_DMN D WHERE D.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND D.DMN_DSCD IN A.DMN_DSCD AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND D.DMN_PNM !=A.DMN_PNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT )

/* WaqDmnMapper.checkExistsWaqDscdAlready */
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.CD_VAL_TYP_CD IN ('O','C') AND EXISTS ( SELECT DMN_DSCD FROM WAQ_DMN D INNER JOIN WAQ_MSTR F ON D.RQST_NO = F.RQST_NO AND F.RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' WHERE D.DMN_DSCD IN A.DMN_DSCD AND F.RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') )

/* WaqDmnMapper.checkDscdLength */
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.CD_VAL_TYP_CD IN ('O','C') AND LENGTH(A.DMN_DSCD) != 4

/* WaqDmnMapper.checkDscdSubjMapping */
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.CD_VAL_TYP_CD IN ('O','C') AND SUBSTR(A.DMN_DSCD,1,2) != 'EL' AND SUBSTR(A.DMN_DSCD,1,2) NOT IN (SELECT SUBJ_PNM FROM WAA_SUBJ WHERE REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d') )
mapper.update:
UPDATE /* WaqDmnMapper.updatervwStsCd */ WAQ_DMN
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd} , RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts} , APRV_DTM = NOW() , APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId} ,
WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND VRF_CD = '1' AND IFNULL(RVW_STS_CD, '_') != '2'

UPDATE /* WaqDmnMapper.updatervwStsCdRejectSwtd */ WAQ_DMN A
A.RVW_STS_CD = '2' ,A.RVW_CONTS = '포함표준단어반려'
WHERE A.rqst_no = #{rqstNo} AND IFNULL(RVW_STS_CD,99) != '2' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_STWD S INNER JOIN WAQ_STWD_CNFG C on C.STWD_LNM = S.STWD_LNM and C.BIZ_DTL_CD = 'DMN' AND C.STND_ASRT = S.STND_ASRT WHERE S.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND S.RVW_STS_CD = '2' and A.RQST_NO = C.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = C.RQST_SNO )
mapper.sql: , DMN_LNM, DMN_PNM, LNM_CRI_DS, DMNG_ID, INFOTP_ID, UPP_DMN_ID, SUBJ_ID, LST_ENTY_ID, LST_ENTY_PNM, LST_ENTY_LNM, LST_ATTR_ID, LST_ATTR_PNM, LST_ATTR_LNM, CD_VAL_TYP_CD, CD_VAL_IVW_CD , SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN, DATA_FRM, CRG_USER_ID, DMN_ORG_DS , RQST_NO , RQST_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID , FULL_PATH , PNM_CRI_DS , ENC_YN,DMN_DSCD,TRANS_YN , DMN_MAX_VAL , DMN_MIN_VAL , DMN_ORG_TXT, SUB_CD_YN , STND_ASRT
mapper.select: SELECT /* WaqDmnMapper.selectWaqC */ * FROM WAQ_DMN WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND REG_TYP_CD = 'C' ORDER BY UPP_DMN_LNM
mapper.update: UPDATE /* WaqDmnMapper.updateWaqCUD */ WAQ_DMN A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_DMN B ON B.DMN_LNM = A.DMN_LNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') SET A.DMN_ID = B.DMN_ID, A.OBJ_VERS = IFNULL(B.OBJ_VERS, 0) + 1, A.FRS_RQST_DTM = B.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID = B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DMN B WHERE B.DMN_LNM = A.DMN_LNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') )

UPDATE /* WaqDmnMapper.updateWaqId */ WAQ_DMN X LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT MAX(B.DMNG_ID) AS DMNG_ID, MAX(C.INFOTP_ID) AS INFOTP_ID, MAX(D.SUBJ_ID) AS SUBJ_ID, MAX(E.PDM_TBL_ID) AS LST_ENTY_ID, MAX(F.PDM_COL_ID) AS LST_ATTR_ID, A.RQST_SNO, #{rqstNo} AS RQST_NO FROM WAQ_DMN A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_DMNG B ON A.DMNG_LNM = B.DMNG_LNM AND B.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT JOIN ( SELECT CASE WHEN BSC_LVL IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE BSC_LVL END AS BSC_LVL FROM WAA_BSC_LVL WHERE EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND BSC_ID = 'DMNG' ) L ON B.DMNG_LVL = L.BSC_LVL LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE C ON A.INFOTP_LNM = C.INFOTP_LNM AND C.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.STND_ASRT = C.STND_ASRT LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_SUBJ D ON A.FULL_PATH = D.FULL_PATH AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL E ON A.LST_ENTY_PNM = E.PDM_TBL_PNM AND A.LST_ENTY_LNM = E.PDM_TBL_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = E.STND_ASRT LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_PDM_COL F ON A.LST_ATTR_PNM = F.PDM_COL_PNM AND A.LST_ATTR_LNM = F.PDM_COL_LNM
WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} GROUP BY A.RQST_SNO )A ON A.RQST_NO = X.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = X.RQST_SNO SET X.DMNG_ID = A.DMNG_ID, X.INFOTP_ID = A.INFOTP_ID, X.SUBJ_ID = A.SUBJ_ID, X.LST_ENTY_ID = A.LST_ENTY_ID, X.LST_ATTR_ID = A.LST_ATTR_ID WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND X.RVW_STS_CD = '1'

UPDATE /* WaqDmnMapper.updateUppDmnId */ WAQ_DMN X LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT MAX(DMN_ID) AS UPP_DMN_ID, A.DMN_LNM AS UPP_DMN_LNM, A.STND_ASRT FROM ( SELECT DMN_ID, DMN_LNM, STND_ASRT FROM WAM_DMN A WHERE 1=1 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DMN B WHERE A.DMN_LNM = B.DMN_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} ) UNION ALL SELECT DMN_ID, DMN_LNM, STND_ASRT FROM WAQ_DMN A WHERE 1=1 AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.RQST_NO =#{rqstNo} ) A GROUP BY A.DMN_LNM, A.STND_ASRT ) A ON X.UPP_DMN_LNM = A.UPP_DMN_LNM AND X.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT SET X.UPP_DMN_ID = A.UPP_DMN_ID WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND X.UPP_DMN_LNM IS NOT NULL AND X.RVW_STS_CD = '1'

/* WaqDmnMapper.checkNotChgData */
AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DMN D INNER JOIN WAA_DMNG E ON D.DMNG_ID = E.DMNG_ID AND D.STND_ASRT = E.STND_ASRT AND E.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') INNER JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE F ON D.INFOTP_ID = F.INFOTP_ID AND D.STND_ASRT = F.STND_ASRT AND F.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') LEFT JOIN WAM_DMN G ON D.UPP_DMN_ID = G.DMN_ID AND D.STND_ASRT = G.STND_ASRT AND G.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT JOIN WAA_SUBJ H ON D.SUBJ_ID = H.SUBJ_ID AND D.STND_ASRT = H.STND_ASRT AND H.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND H.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND IFNULL(A.DMN_PNM , '') = IFNULL(D.DMN_PNM , '') AND IFNULL(A.DMNG_LNM , '') = IFNULL(E.DMNG_LNM , '') AND IFNULL(A.INFOTP_LNM , '') = IFNULL(F.INFOTP_LNM , '')
AND IFNULL(A.LNM_CRI_DS , '') = IFNULL(D.LNM_CRI_DS , '') AND IFNULL(A.PNM_CRI_DS , '') = IFNULL(D.PNM_CRI_DS , '') AND IFNULL(NULLIF(A.UPP_DMN_LNM, ''),'') = IFNULL(NULLIF(G.DMN_LNM ,'') , '') AND IFNULL(A.FULL_PATH , '') = IFNULL(H.FULL_PATH , '') AND IFNULL(A.LST_ENTY_PNM , '') = IFNULL(D.LST_ENTY_PNM , '') AND IFNULL(A.LST_ENTY_LNM , '') = IFNULL(D.LST_ENTY_LNM , '') AND IFNULL(A.LST_ATTR_PNM , '') = IFNULL(D.LST_ATTR_PNM , '') AND IFNULL(A.LST_ATTR_LNM , '') = IFNULL(D.LST_ATTR_LNM , '') AND IFNULL(A.CD_VAL_TYP_CD, '') = IFNULL(D.CD_VAL_TYP_CD, '') AND IFNULL(A.CD_VAL_IVW_CD, '') = IFNULL(D.CD_VAL_IVW_CD, '')
AND IFNULL(A.DATA_FRM , '_') = IFNULL(D.DATA_FRM , '_') AND IFNULL(A.CRG_USER_ID , '_') = IFNULL(D.CRG_USER_ID , '_')
AND IFNULL(A.OBJ_DESCN , '') = IFNULL(D.OBJ_DESCN , '')
AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') ) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_CD_VAL D WHERE D.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND D.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND D.VRF_CD = '1')
mapper.delete: DELETE A /* WaqDmnMapper.deleteWAM */ FROM WAM_DMN A INNER JOIN WAQ_DMN B ON B.DMN_LNM = A.DMN_LNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1'
mapper.update: UPDATE /* WaqDmnMapper.updateWAH */ WAH_DMN A INNER JOIN WAQ_DMN B ON B.DMN_LNM = A.DMN_LNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT SET EXP_DTM = NOW() WHERE A.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1'
mapper.insert:
/* WaqDmnMapper.checkCodeErr */
-- AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_CD_VAL D WHERE D.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.VRF_CD = '2' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_RQST_VRF_DTLS E WHERE D.RQST_NO = E.RQST_NO AND D.RQST_SNO = E.RQST_SNO AND D.RQST_DTL_SNO = E.RQST_DTL_SNO AND E.VRF_DTL_CD NOT IN ('CV000')) ) -- AND A.CD_VAL_TYP_CD IN ('0', 'C')

/* WaqDmnMapper.checkSimpleCodeLevelCheck */
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.CD_VAL_TYP_CD = 'O' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DMN D WHERE D.CD_VAL_TYP_CD = 'O' AND D.DMN_ID = A.UPP_DMN_ID AND D.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT AND LEVEL >= 3 AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') START WITH D.UPP_DMN_ID IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR D.DMN_ID = D.UPP_DMN_ID )
mapper.update: UPDATE /* WaqDmnMapper.updateSditmInfoTp */ WAM_SDITM Z LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.INFOTP_ID, B.DMN_ID FROM WAQ_DMN A INNER JOIN WAM_DMN B ON A.DMN_ID = B.DMN_ID AND A.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT AND A.INFOTP_ID != B.INFOTP_ID INNER JOIN V_WAA_DMNG C ON C.DMNG_ID = B.DMNG_ID AND C.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND C.DMNG_LNM = '코드' )A ON A.DMN_ID = Z.DMN_ID SET Z.INFOTP_ID = A.INFOTP_ID WHERE EXISTS (SELECT A.INFOTP_ID FROM WAQ_DMN A INNER JOIN WAM_DMN B ON A.DMN_ID = B.DMN_ID AND A.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT AND A.INFOTP_ID != B.INFOTP_ID INNER JOIN V_WAA_DMNG C ON C.DMNG_ID = B.DMNG_ID AND C.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND C.DMNG_LNM = '코드' AND B.DMN_ID = Z.DMN_ID )

UPDATE /* WaqDmnMapper.updateSditmInfoTpWah */ WAH_SDITM Z LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.INFOTP_ID, B.DMN_ID, B.STND_ASRT FROM WAQ_DMN A INNER JOIN WAM_DMN B ON A.DMN_ID = B.DMN_ID AND A.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT AND A.INFOTP_ID != B.INFOTP_ID WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) A ON Z.DMN_ID = A.DMN_ID AND Z.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT SET Z.INFOTP_ID = A.INFOTP_ID WHERE EXISTS (SELECT A.INFOTP_ID FROM WAQ_DMN A INNER JOIN WAM_DMN B ON A.DMN_ID = B.DMN_ID AND A.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT AND A.INFOTP_ID != B.INFOTP_ID WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND Z.DMN_ID = B.DMN_ID AND Z.INFOTP_ID = B.INFOTP_ID ) AND Z.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND Z.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')

/* WaqDmnMapper.checkExistsSditm */
and A.REG_TYP_CD = 'C' AND A.SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN ='Y' AND A.DMN_PNM IN (SELECT Z.SDITM_PNM FROM WAM_SDITM Z WHERE A.STND_ASRT = Z.STND_ASRT )

UPDATE /* WaqDmnMapper.updateWahTransYn */ WAH_DMN A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAH_DMN B ON A.DMN_ID = B.DMN_ID AND A.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT AND (A.OBJ_VERS-1) = B.OBJ_VERS AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') SET A.TRANS_YN = IFNULL(B.TRANS_YN, 'N') WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231','%Y%m%d')

UPDATE /* WaqDmnMapper.updateRejItemByDmn */ WAQ_SDITM A SET RVW_STS_CD = '2' WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DMN B WHERE B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.DMN_LNM = A.DMN_LNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT AND B.REG_TYP_CD = 'C' AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '2' )

UPDATE /* WaqDmnMapper.updateRejDmnByWrd */ WAQ_DMN A SET RVW_STS_CD = '2' WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_STWD_CNFG B INNER JOIN WAQ_STWD C ON C.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND C.STWD_LNM = B.STWD_LNM AND C.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT AND C.REG_TYP_CD = 'C' AND C.RVW_STS_CD = '2' WHERE B.BIZ_DTL_CD = 'DMN' AND B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO )

UPDATE /* WaqDmnMapper.updateDmnDelInfo */ WAQ_DMN A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT B.DMN_PNM, B.LNM_CRI_DS, B.DMNG_ID, D.DMNG_LNM, B.INFOTP_ID
, C.INFOTP_LNM, C.DATA_TYPE, C.DATA_LEN, C.DATA_SCAL , B.UPP_DMN_ID, B.SUBJ_ID, B.LST_ENTY_ID, B.LST_ENTY_PNM, B.LST_ENTY_LNM, B.LST_ATTR_ID, B.LST_ATTR_PNM, B.LST_ATTR_LNM , B.CD_VAL_TYP_CD, B.CD_VAL_IVW_CD, B.SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN, B.DATA_FRM, B.CRG_USER_ID, B.DMN_ORG_DS , B.OBJ_DESCN , B.FRS_RQST_DTM , B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID , B.FULL_PATH, B.PNM_CRI_DS, ENC_YN, B.DMN_DSCD, B.TRANS_YN, B.DMN_ORG_TXT,B.SUB_CD_YN , B.DMN_LNM , B.STND_ASRT
FROM WAM_DMN B
LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE C ON C.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31','%Y-%m-%d') AND C.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT AND C.INFOTP_ID = B.INFOTP_ID INNER JOIN V_WAA_DMNG D ON D.DMNG_ID = B.DMNG_ID AND D.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT )B ON B.DMN_LNM = A.DMN_LNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT SET A.DMN_PNM = B.DMN_PNM, A.LNM_CRI_DS = B.LNM_CRI_DS, A.DMNG_ID = B.DMNG_ID, A.DMNG_LNM = B.DMNG_LNM, A.INFOTP_ID = B.INFOTP_ID, A.INFOTP_LNM = B.INFOTP_LNM, A.DATA_TYPE = B.DATA_TYPE, A.DATA_LEN = B.DATA_LEN, A.DATA_SCAL = B.DATA_SCAL, A.UPP_DMN_ID = B.UPP_DMN_ID, A.SUBJ_ID = B.SUBJ_ID, A.LST_ENTY_ID = B.LST_ENTY_ID, A.LST_ENTY_PNM = B.LST_ENTY_PNM, A.LST_ENTY_LNM = B.LST_ENTY_LNM, A.LST_ATTR_ID = B.LST_ATTR_ID, A.LST_ATTR_PNM = B.LST_ATTR_PNM, A.LST_ATTR_LNM = B.LST_ATTR_LNM, A.CD_VAL_TYP_CD = B.CD_VAL_TYP_CD, A.CD_VAL_IVW_CD = B.CD_VAL_IVW_CD, A.SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN = B.SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN, A.DATA_FRM = B.DATA_FRM, A.CRG_USER_ID = B.CRG_USER_ID, A.DMN_ORG_DS = B.DMN_ORG_DS, A.OBJ_DESCN = B.OBJ_DESCN, A.FRS_RQST_DTM = B.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID = B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.FULL_PATH = B.FULL_PATH, A.PNM_CRI_DS = B.PNM_CRI_DS, A.ENC_YN = B.ENC_YN, A.DMN_DSCD = B.DMN_DSCD, A.TRANS_YN= B.TRANS_YN, A.DMN_ORG_TXT= B.DMN_ORG_TXT, A.SUB_CD_YN = B.SUB_CD_YN WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'D' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DMN B WHERE B.DMN_LNM = A.DMN_LNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT )
UPDATE /* WaqDmnMapper.updateSubdmmYNotSdtem */ WAQ_DMN A SET A.SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN = 'N' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND IFNULL(SUB_CD_YN,'N') = 'Y'
mapper.insert:
INSERT /* WaqDmnMapper.insertWaqDmnByCdVal */ INTO WAQ_DMN ( RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, DMN_ID, DMN_LNM, DMN_PNM , LNM_CRI_DS , PNM_CRI_DS , RQST_DCD, DMNG_ID, DMNG_LNM , INFOTP_ID, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL, INFOTP_LNM, UPP_DMN_ID, UPP_DMN_LNM , SUBJ_ID, LST_ENTY_ID, LST_ENTY_PNM, LST_ENTY_LNM, CD_VAL_TYP_CD, CD_VAL_IVW_CD , DATA_FRM, SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN, CRG_USER_ID, DMN_ORG_DS, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS,ENC_YN,DMN_DSCD, FULL_PATH,DMN_ORG_TXT,SUB_CD_YN,STND_ASRT ) SELECT #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , IFNULL((SELECT MAX(X.RQST_SNO) FROM WAQ_DMN X WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ), 0) + @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS RQST_SNO
, A.DMN_ID, A.DMN_LNM, A.DMN_PNM , A.LNM_CRI_DS , A.PNM_CRI_DS , 'CU', A.DMNG_ID, B.DMNG_LNM , A.INFOTP_ID, C.DATA_TYPE, C.DATA_LEN, C.DATA_SCAL, C.INFOTP_LNM, A.UPP_DMN_ID, D.DMN_LNM , A.SUBJ_ID, A.LST_ENTY_ID, A.LST_ENTY_PNM, A.LST_ENTY_LNM, A.CD_VAL_TYP_CD, A.CD_VAL_IVW_CD , A.DATA_FRM, A.SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN, A.CRG_USER_ID, A.DMN_ORG_DS, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS,A.ENC_YN,A.DMN_DSCD, A.FULL_PATH, A.DMN_ORG_TXT,A.SUB_CD_YN , A.STND_ASRT
FROM (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP, WAM_DMN A LEFT JOIN WAA_DMNG B ON B.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT AND B.DMNG_ID = A.DMNG_ID LEFT JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE C ON C.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND C.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT AND C.INFOTP_ID = A.INFOTP_ID LEFT JOIN WAM_DMN D ON D.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT AND D.DMN_ID = A.UPP_DMN_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.DMN_LNM = #{dmnLnm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.STND_ASRT = #{stndAsrt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DMN X WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND X.DMN_LNM = #{dmnLnm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND X.STND_ASRT = #{stndAsrt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

/* WaqDmnMapper.checkSubDmnUppDmnDup */
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.DMN_LNM = A.UPP_DMN_LNM AND A.SUB_CD_YN = 'Y'

/* WaqDmnMapper.checkSUbDmnUppDmnExists */
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND IFNULL(A.UPP_DMN_LNM,'') = '' AND A.SUB_CD_YN = 'Y'

/* WaqDmnMapper.checkSubDmnCode */
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.SUB_CD_YN = 'Y' AND A.DMN_TYP_CD != 'COD'

/* WaqDmnMapper.checkRestrictDmnSuffix */
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAA_COMM_DCD CD INNER JOIN WAA_COMM_DTL_CD DC ON CD.COMM_DCD_ID = DC.COMM_DCD_ID AND DC.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND DC.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE CD.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND CD.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND CD.COMM_DCD='RESTRICT_DMN_SUFFIX' AND A.DMN_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%',DC.COMM_DTL_CD_NM) )

/* WaqDmnMapper.checkDmmDSubDmnChekc */
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DMN B WHERE A.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT AND A.DMN_ID = B.UPP_DMN_ID ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DMN C WHERE A.RQST_NO = C.RQST_NO AND A.DMN_ID = C.UPP_DMN_ID AND C.RQST_DCD ='DD' )
mapper.update: UPDATE /* WaqDmnMapper.updateFullPath */ WAQ_DMN A INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ B ON A.SUBJ_ID = B.SUBJ_ID AND A.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT AND B.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231','%Y%m%d') AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') SET A.FULL_PATH = B.FULL_PATH WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} -- AND IFNULL(A.FULL_PATH,'') = ''

UPDATE /* WaqDmnMapper.updateSubjId */ WAQ_DMN A INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ B ON A.FULL_PATH = B.FULL_PATH AND A.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT AND B.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231','%Y%m%d') AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') SET A.SUBJ_ID = B.SUBJ_ID WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} -- AND IFNULL(A.SUBJ_ID,'') = ''
mapper.select:
SELECT /* WaqDmnMapper.selectwamninfolist */ IFNULL((SELECT MAX(X.RQST_SNO) FROM WAQ_DMN X WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{reqmst.rqstNo} ), 0) + @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS RQST_SNO , 'I' AS IBS_STATUS , A.DMN_ID, A.DMN_LNM, A.DMN_PNM, A.LNM_CRI_DS, A.PNM_CRI_DS , #{reqmst.rqstDcd} AS RQST_DCD, A.DMNG_ID, B.DMNG_LNM , A.INFOTP_ID, A.DATA_TYPE, A.DATA_LEN, A.DATA_SCAL, A.UPP_DMN_ID, D.DMN_LNM AS UPP_DMN_LNM , A.SUBJ_ID, A.LST_ENTY_ID, A.LST_ENTY_PNM, A.LST_ENTY_LNM, A.LST_ATTR_ID, A.LST_ATTR_PNM, A.LST_ATTR_LNM, A.CD_VAL_TYP_CD, A.CD_VAL_IVW_CD , A.DATA_FRM, A.SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN, A.CRG_USER_ID, A.DMN_ORG_DS, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS,A.ENC_YN,A.DMN_DSCD,A.FULL_PATH,A.DMN_ORG_TXT,A.SUB_CD_YN , A.STND_ASRT
FROM (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP, WAM_DMN A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_DMNG B ON A.DMNG_ID = B.DMNG_ID AND A.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT AND B.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d')
LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_DMN D ON A.UPP_DMN_ID = D.DMN_ID AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT
WHERE (A.DMN_ID, A.STND_ASRT) IN
( #{item.dmnId} , #{item.stndAsrt} )
AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
mapper.update:
/* WaqDmnMapper.checkNotChgDataNInfo */
AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DMN D INNER JOIN WAA_DMNG E ON D.DMNG_ID = E.DMNG_ID AND D.STND_ASRT = E.STND_ASRT AND E.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') LEFT JOIN WAM_DMN G ON D.UPP_DMN_ID = G.DMN_ID AND D.STND_ASRT = G.STND_ASRT AND G.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT JOIN WAA_SUBJ H ON D.SUBJ_ID = H.SUBJ_ID AND D.STND_ASRT = H.STND_ASRT AND H.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND H.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND IFNULL(A.DMN_PNM , '') = IFNULL(D.DMN_PNM , '') AND IFNULL(A.DMNG_LNM , '') = IFNULL(E.DMNG_LNM , '') AND IFNULL(A.DATA_TYPE , '_') = IFNULL(D.DATA_TYPE , '_') AND IFNULL(A.DATA_LEN , 99999) = IFNULL(D.DATA_LEN , 99999) AND IFNULL(A.DATA_SCAL , 99999) = IFNULL(D.DATA_SCAL , 99999) AND IFNULL(A.LNM_CRI_DS , '') = IFNULL(D.LNM_CRI_DS , '') AND IFNULL(A.PNM_CRI_DS , '') = IFNULL(D.PNM_CRI_DS , '') AND IFNULL(NULLIF(A.UPP_DMN_LNM, ''),'') = IFNULL(NULLIF(G.DMN_LNM ,'') , '') AND IFNULL(A.FULL_PATH , '') = IFNULL(H.FULL_PATH , '') AND IFNULL(A.LST_ENTY_PNM , '') = IFNULL(D.LST_ENTY_PNM , '') AND IFNULL(A.LST_ENTY_LNM , '') = IFNULL(D.LST_ENTY_LNM , '') AND IFNULL(A.LST_ATTR_PNM , '') = IFNULL(D.LST_ATTR_PNM , '') AND IFNULL(A.LST_ATTR_LNM , '') = IFNULL(D.LST_ATTR_LNM , '') AND IFNULL(A.CD_VAL_TYP_CD, '') = IFNULL(D.CD_VAL_TYP_CD, '') AND IFNULL(A.CD_VAL_IVW_CD, '') = IFNULL(D.CD_VAL_IVW_CD, '')
AND IFNULL(A.DATA_FRM , '_') = IFNULL(D.DATA_FRM , '_') AND IFNULL(A.CRG_USER_ID , '_') = IFNULL(D.CRG_USER_ID , '_')
AND IFNULL(A.OBJ_DESCN , '') = IFNULL(D.OBJ_DESCN , '')
AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') ) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_CD_VAL D WHERE D.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND D.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND D.VRF_CD = '1')
mapper.insert:
/* WaqDmnMapper.checkSubDmnYnChgYToN */
AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND IFNULL(A.SUB_CD_YN,'N') = 'N' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DMN B WHERE B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT AND B.DMN_LNM = A.DMN_LNM AND B.SUB_CD_YN ='Y' )
mapper.update:
-- 담당자 업데이트(변경 삭제대상일 경우 기존 담당자로 고정) UPDATE /* WaqDdlEtcMapper.updateTsfInfo */ WAQ_DMN A INNER JOIN WAM_DMN B ON A.DMN_ID = B.DMN_ID AND A.DMN_PNM = B.DMN_PNM AND A.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT
SET A.CRG_USER_ID = B.CRG_USER_ID -- 등록유형이 변경일 경우 담당자는 기존 담당자로 고정
WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('U', 'D')
